column4: Today I sent letters to Gov. Kemp & House officials to say I would be stepping down from Congress on Sunday, 10/4. It is time to begin the next season in life. I will be forever grateful for the incredible privilege of serving my country & community as a member of Congress. https://t.co/bcdCPl8aRH
Our President @realDonaldTrump & First Lady @FLOTUS are fighters. Praying for their good health and a quick recovery.

"The group forged ahead together even as an impeachment inquiry tore @ the fabric of the nation & stoked partisanship, & a global pandemic challenged lawmakers & staff to reimagine legislative biz and constituent services in the digital space."

ACDC updates the The Computer Fraud & Abuse Act to allow authorized individuals & businesses to actively defend their computer networks. The Computer Fraud & Abuse Act was enacted in 1986 ‚Äì more than 30 years ago.

THREAD: We have a cyber crime crisis in this country. American businesses and consumers need more tools to defend themselves online. That‚Äôs why @RepJoshG & I introduced the bipartisan Active Cyber Defense Certainty Act (ACDC) (H.R. 3270).

We have a cyber crime crisis in this country. The Active Cyber Defense Act would spur innovation to help organizations & businesses address these types of crimes. @RepJoshG #ACDC 

https://t.co/IilabIt1FF
American companies are on the frontlines of a lopsided cyber battlefield. It‚Äôs time for Congress to act. #ACDC https://t.co/abQbhEDDTr https://t.co/BBlUQXCiOi

We need to address the modern-day cybersecurity threats that exist in the 21st century. It's time to take a more active approach.

We have a cyber crisis in this country. Americans need more tools to defend themselves online. Thx for your support @RepLoudermilk. #ACDC https://t.co/Y9Wx3q9dZy

Here's what #ACDC DOESN'T do: promote vigilantism and rogue hacking of just anyone‚Äôs computer. 

There are safeguards to help ensure that active defense is only targeted at the source of an attack.

#ACDC is the 1st step towards empowering the American ppl and American biz to defend themselves against cybercriminals. It should be the norm - not the exception - for criminal hackers to be identified and held accountable for their crimes. 

https://t.co/1TOISTrxic
The current status quo when it comes to cyber defense just doesn‚Äôt cut it. #ACDC brings light into the dark places where cybercriminals operate & gives an edge to cyber defenders.
#ACDC updates the Computer Fraud & Abuse Act, which is 33 yrs old and in need of changes. Tech has outpaced public policy & our laws need to catch up.  üì±üíªüñ•Ô∏è

Today @RepJoshG & I introduced the Active Cyber Defense Certainty Act (#ACDC), a bill that gives American biz & consumers more tools to defend themselves online. (THREAD) #YouHackedMeAllNightLong #LetThereBeBeaconing

My #ACDC bill also addresses cybersecurity needs with more options to monitor, identify & stop attackers. Will be reintroducing soon w/ bipartisan support. 

Cybersecurity may be the most pressing challenge that we face as a nation.

Protecting the innocent & fighting for #prolife issues was 1 of the reasons I first entered public service. Honored to receive the "True Blue" award from @FRCdc which recognizes those w/ consistent support for life & religious liberty. More from @mdjonline https://t.co/ZjOarwpXwy

This week, the House built on the progress we made last week in addressing the opioid epidemic, which kills more than 115 Americans every day. Bipartisan bills we passed enhance prescription drug monitoring programs & improve access to federal resources. https://t.co/qTCLZvzSvg

#OpioidEpidemic is devastating families across America. Bipartisan bills passed this week expand access to recovery centers, improve data to help at-risk patients, give law enforcement better tools & help stop foreign shipments of illegal drugs. Read more: https://t.co/qTCLZvzSvg
